word:
Miriam,  Sister of Moses
Book of Exodus; Numbers 12
MIRIAM WATCHED OVER MOSES AS THEIR MOTHER HID HIM IN THE BULRUSHES. LATER SHE WAS ASSOCIATED WITH MOSES AND AARON IN THE DELIVERANCE OF GOD'S PEOPLE FROM EGYPT. SHE WAS TALENTED AND GIFTED IN MANY WAYS, BUT JEALOUSY OF HER POSITION WITH MOSES LED HER TO MAKE SERIOUS MISTAKES.
